author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
title: Whitmer says she's assessing relaxing Michigan's stay-at-home order
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said Thursday that she's assessing reopening parts of the state's economy, as the Democratic governor faced angry protests last week over her stringent "stay-at-home" order intended to fight the spread of coronavirus.
content:
(CNN)Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said Thursday that she's assessing reopening parts of the state's economy, as the Democratic governor faced angry protests last week over her stringent "stay-at-home" order intended to fight the spread of coronavirus.
